Effort? Scooby Doo? Those episodes were made on the budget of a gumball.

I guess that they just saw that the formula was working...? I wonder if the workers for each show ever saw each other in the workplace. And if it got awkward. Like it was highschool, and they were all striving to be with the cool kids (the Scooby Doo producers).
